name: part_008
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】ねぽらぼ学園 ☆5周年記念！！輝く学寮祭☆【#ねぽらぼ5周年学祭3Dライブ】 [-7fWewjcygo]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Kamisama no Shima Nagashi'.
NePoLaBo members resting in their dormitory rooms after the performance.
Exterior shot of the school during a PA announcement.
The members head to the school shop and discover their anniversary merchandise.
Product showcase segment for the 'NePoLaBo Anniversary Parade' 5th anniversary merchandise.

subtitles.original: このところの
subtitles.english: Lately...

subtitles.original: このところの
subtitles.english: Lately...

subtitles.original: 不安な夜は
subtitles.english: During anxious nights,

subtitles.original: 不安な夜は
subtitles.english: During anxious nights,

subtitles.original: 胸の奥の
subtitles.english: Deep in my chest,

subtitles.original: 胸の奥の奥
subtitles.english: Deep, deep in my chest,

subtitles.original: チリチリと鳴き通す
subtitles.english: A prickling sound cries through.

subtitles.original: Ah 会えない理由はわかってるのに
subtitles.english: Ah, even though I know the reason we can't meet,

subtitles.original: 物語の鍵を握って 遊んでいるのは誰？
subtitles.english: Who is it that holds the key to the story and plays around?

subtitles.original: ずいぶん悪趣味な暇潰し
subtitles.english: It's a quite distasteful way to kill time.

subtitles.original: その心の奥を掴んで 揺さぶるものは何？
subtitles.english: What is it that grabs the depths of that heart and shakes it?

subtitles.original: 考えてるだけで日が暮れて
subtitles.english: The day ends just from me thinking about it,

subtitles.original: 苦しくて 切なくて 楽しくて 日が暮れて
subtitles.english: Painful, heartbreaking, and joyful, the day ends,

subtitles.original: 苦しくて 切なくて この恋に明け暮れる
subtitles.english: Painful, heartbreaking, I spend all my time in this love.

subtitles.original: つっ……疲れた～～！！
subtitles.english: Phew... I'm tired!!

subtitles.original: さすがに……全員連続は応えたね……
subtitles.english: As expected... doing everyone back-to-back was tough...

subtitles.original: でもでもっ！どの曲もサイコーだった～～っ♪
subtitles.english: But, but! Every song was the absolute best!

subtitles.original: うん…、でも、“わたしたちらしさ”があるかって言われると…ちょっと悩むな～
subtitles.english: Yeah... but if you asked if it felt like 'us'... I'm a bit unsure.

subtitles.original: まもなく、学寮祭が始まります
subtitles.english: The dormitory festival will begin shortly.

subtitles.original: 関係する生徒の皆さんは、速やかに準備をお願いします
subtitles.english: Students involved, please begin your preparations promptly.

subtitles.original: やっ、やば～い！！もう始まっちゃうってば～～っ！
subtitles.english: Oh no! It's starting already!

subtitles.original: え～～お腹空いた～～ ちょっと購買行ってくるねっ！！
subtitles.english: Ugh, I'm hungry. I'm gonna go to the shop for a bit!

subtitles.original: じゃ、わたしも行く～～♪
subtitles.english: Then I'll go too.

subtitles.original: ラミィも行く～～！
subtitles.english: Lamy's going too!

subtitles.original: えぇ～～っ！？ちょっと～！？
subtitles.english: Wait, what?! Hold on!

subtitles.original: パン残ってるかな～～
subtitles.english: I wonder if there's any bread left...

subtitles.original: ……ん？あれって……なんだ？？
subtitles.english: ...Hm? What is... that??

subtitles.original: こ、これは
subtitles.english: Th-this is...

subtitles.original: もしかして……！
subtitles.english: Could it be...!

subtitles.original: もしかなくても！
subtitles.english: No doubt about it!

subtitles.original: 間違いないっ！！
subtitles.english: It's definitely it!!

subtitles.original: ねぽらぼアニバーサリーパレード！！
subtitles.english: NePoLaBo Anniversary Parade!!

subtitles.original: ねぽらぼ5周年グッズがこんなところに！
subtitles.english: NePoLaBo 5th Anniversary goods are in a place like this!

subtitles.original: きっと今日の配信終わりに出るやつだ！
subtitles.english: This is definitely the stuff that drops after today's stream ends!

subtitles.original: 気になる～
subtitles.english: I'm so curious!

subtitles.original: これは順番に見ていくしかないでしょ！
subtitles.english: We've got no choice but to look through them one by one!

subtitles.original: まずは、プレミアムアクリル色紙！
subtitles.english: First up, the Premium Acrylic Shikishi!

subtitles.original: 今回のグッズのテーマが、花鳥風月！
subtitles.english: The theme for these goods is 'Kacho Fugetsu' (Beauties of Nature)!

subtitles.original: 七原しえさんが描いてくれました！ ねねたちの和服姿、綺麗でしょ！
subtitles.english: Shie Nanahara drew this for us! Our kimono outfits look beautiful, right!

subtitles.original: アクリル色紙には、ねねたちの複製サインと、ロゴが入っています！
subtitles.english: The acrylic shikishi features our reproduced signatures and the logo!

subtitles.original: アクリルの脚もついてるから、机に飾っておくこともできるよ！
subtitles.english: It also comes with acrylic legs, so you can display it on your desk!

subtitles.original: めっちゃ可愛いので、ぜひ！
subtitles.english: It's super cute, so please check it out!

subtitles.original: 次！
subtitles.english: Next!

subtitles.original: 続いては、オフィシャルホロカスリーブ アニバーサリーパレードねぽらぼバージョン！
subtitles.english: Next is the Official Holoca Sleeves: Anniversary Parade NePoLaBo Version!

subtitles.original: もちろん、ホロカが入るスリーブです！
subtitles.english: Of course, these are sleeves designed to fit Holoca cards!

subtitles.original: 1パック60枚入ってるから、これでねぽらぼデッキを作り上げてください！
subtitles.english: One pack has 60 sleeves, so please build a NePoLaBo deck with these!

subtitles.original: いや、もう最近はね、ねぽらぼ全員出ちゃいましたから
subtitles.english: Well, recently, all of NePoLaBo have been released in the card game!

subtitles.original: もうこれでお前のオリジナルの、デッキ構築をして、優勝していくんだ！
subtitles.english: So build your original deck with these and aim for the win!

subtitles.original: さあ、お前ならできる！やるしかない！
subtitles.english: Come on, you can do it! You've got to do it!

subtitles.original: 見ているお前ら、ねぽらぼリスナー、お前ら頑張ってくれ！
subtitles.english: All of you watching, NePoLaBo listeners, give it your best!

subtitles.original: 次！
subtitles.english: Next!

subtitles.original: 続いては、アクリルスタンド！
subtitles.english: Next up, Acrylic Stands!

subtitles.original: プレミアムアクリル色紙とは別の表情をした、ラミィたちのアクリルスタンドです！
subtitles.english: These are acrylic stands of Lamy and the others with different expressions!

subtitles.original: 花鳥風月で、花・春が桃鈴ねね
subtitles.english: Based on 'Kacho Fugetsu', Flower/Spring is Momosuzu Nene,

subtitles.original: 鳥・秋が獅白ぼたん
subtitles.english: Bird/Autumn is Shishiro Botan,

subtitles.original: 風・夏が尾丸ポルカ
subtitles.english: Wind/Summer is Omaru Polka,

subtitles.original: 月・冬が雪花ラミィとなっています！
subtitles.english: and Moon/Winter is Yukihana Lamy!

subtitles.original: では、次！
subtitles.english: Now, next!

subtitles.original: 最後は、記念メダル！専用のケースと巾着がついてくる記念メダルです！
subtitles.english: Last is the Memorial Medal! It comes with a special case and drawstring bag!

subtitles.original: それぞれタレントカラーと名前が入っていて、期生ごとにデザインが違うので、コレクションアイテムとしてぜひ揃えてみてください！
subtitles.english: Each features a talent's color and name with generation-specific designs, so try collecting them all!

subtitles.original: 以上、ねぽらぼアニバーサリーパレードのグッズでした！
subtitles.english: That's all for the NePoLaBo Anniversary Parade merchandise!
